reference.title: The Do's and Do Not's of Using Kaltura
reference.shortdesc: Information detailing when it is and is not appropriate to use Kaltura.

ul.li: DO access Kaltura through Canvas and Kaltura MediaSpace.

li.p: DO use Kaltura for files that will be actively used on an ongoing basis.
DO NOT use Kaltura for videos not related to teaching, learning, research, or outreach. For those videos, use Youtube.
DO NOT use Kaltura for storing Protected Health Information (PHI). Use Box Secure Storage instead.
DO NOT use Kaltura as a platform for archiving media files.
